text: Arra no michibika reru mono koso, michibika reta monodearu. Daga kare ga mayou ni makaseta mono ni taishite wa, kare no soto ni wa kesshite hogo-sha ga nai koto o, anata wa shirudearou. Ware wa fukkatsu no hi ni, kare-ra no kao o utsumuke ni shite shoshu suru. Mienai mono,-mono ienai-sha, kikoenai-sha to shite. Kare-ra no sumai wa jigokudearu. Soshite (kasei ga) otoroeru tabi ni ware wa kare-ra no tame ni rekka o kuwaeru
